description: On International Human Rights Day we look at the right to education. Tyler Paige is one of 11 students occupying a building at Cooper Union demanding that the college continue to offer free education. Students, faculty and alumni are united in this effort which is part of the global movement for the right to education.

title: Show #39 Crises in Tuition & Predatory Student Lending:Tyler Paige, Lynn Petrovich & Danny Weil
